sourcesContent:
// File: client/src/pages/CreateGig.js import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { AuthContext } from '../context/AuthContext'; import api from '../utils/api'; const CreateGig = () => { const { currentUser } = useContext(AuthContext); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ title: '', description: '', category: '', subCategory: '', pricingType: 'fixed', price: '', deliveryTime: '', tags: '', images: [] }); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false); // Mock categories for prototype const categories = [ { id: 'technical', name: 'Technical Services', subCategories: [ 'Web Development', 'Mobile App Development', 'Software Development', 'IT Support', 'Cybersecurity', 'Cloud Computing', 'Data Science & Analytics', 'AI & Machine Learning' ] }, { id: 'design', name: 'Design & Creative', subCategories: [ 'Graphic Design', 'Logo & Branding', 'UI/UX Design', 'Video Editing', 'Animation & Motion Graphics', 'Illustration', '3D Modeling', 'Print Design' ] }, { id: 'writing', name: 'Writing & Translation', subCategories: [ 'Content Writing', 'Copywriting', 'Technical Writing', 'Creative Writing', 'Translation', 'Proofreading & Editing', 'Resume & Cover Letter Writing', 'Scriptwriting' ] }, { id: 'electrical', name: 'Electrical Services', subCategories: [ 'Electrical Installations', 'Electrical Repairs', 'Electrical Maintenance', 'Smart Home Setup', 'Solar Panel Installation', 'Lighting Design' ] }, { id: 'plumbing', name: 'Plumbing Services', subCategories: [ 'Plumbing Installations', 'Plumbing Repairs', 'Drain Cleaning', 'Water Heater Services', 'Pipe Leak Repair', 'Bathroom Remodeling' ] }, { id: 'cleaning', name: 'Cleaning Services', subCategories: [ 'Home Cleaning', 'Office Cleaning', 'Carpet Cleaning', 'Window Cleaning', 'Deep Cleaning', 'Move-In/Move-Out Cleaning', 'Disinfection Services' ] }, { id: 'grooming', name: 'Personal Grooming', subCategories: [ 'Haircut & Styling', 'Makeup & Beauty', 'Spa Treatments', 'Massage Therapy', 'Nail Art & Care', 'Barber Services', 'Skincare Treatments' ] }, { id: 'caregiving', name: 'Caregiving Services', subCategories: [ 'Child Care', 'Elder Care', 'Pet Care', 'Special Needs Care', 'Babysitting', 'Home Nursing', 'Companion Services' ] }, { id: 'marketing', name: 'Marketing & Advertising', subCategories: [ 'Social Media Marketing', 'SEO & SEM', 'Content Marketing', 'Email Marketing', 'Influencer Marketing', 'Branding & Strategy', 'Digital Advertising' ] }, { id: 'business', name: 'Business Consulting', subCategories: [ 'Business Plan Development', 'Financial Consulting', 'Market Research', 'Startup Consulting', 'HR & Recruitment', 'Legal Consulting', 'Operations Management' ] }, { id: 'education', name: 'Education & Tutoring', subCategories: [ 'Online Tutoring', 'Test Preparation', 'Language Lessons', 'Curriculum Development', 'Career Counseling', 'E-Learning Content', 'Workshops & Training' ] }, { id: 'health', name: 'Health & Wellness', subCategories: [ 'Fitness Training', 'Nutrition Consulting', 'Mental Health Counseling', 'Wellness Coaching', 'Physical Therapy', 'Yoga & Meditation', 'Health Education' ] }, { id: 'events', name: 'Event Planning', subCategories: [ 'Wedding Planning', 'Corporate Events', 'Party Planning', 'Virtual Events', 'Catering Services', 'Event Decorations', 'Event Photography' ] }, { id: 'photography', name: 'Photography & Videography', subCategories: [ 'Portrait Photography', 'Event Photography', 'Product Photography', 'Drone Videography', 'Video Production', 'Photo Editing', 'Commercial Photography' ] }, { id: 'legal', name: 'Legal Services', subCategories: [ 'Contract Drafting', 'Intellectual Property', 'Family Law', 'Real Estate Law', 'Immigration Law', 'Corporate Law', 'Legal Consulting' ] }, { id: 'real-estate', name: 'Real Estate Services', subCategories: [ 'Property Management', 'Real Estate Photography', 'Home Staging', 'Real Estate Consulting', 'Mortgage Brokering', 'Rental Services', 'Property Investment' ] }, { id: 'automotive', name: 'Automotive Services', subCategories: [ 'Car Repair & Maintenance', 'Car Detailing', 'Auto Body Repair', 'Car Rental Services', 'Driving Lessons', 'Vehicle Inspection', 'Towing Services' ] }, { id: 'art', name: 'Art & Craft', subCategories: [ 'Handmade Crafts', 'Painting & Drawing', 'Sculpting', 'DIY Projects', 'Custom Artwork', 'Craft Workshops', 'Art Restoration' ] }, { id: 'music', name: 'Music & Audio', subCategories: [ 'Music Production', 'Audio Editing', 'Voiceover Services', 'Songwriting', 'Instrument Lessons', 'Sound Design', 'Podcast Production' ] }, { id: 'logistics', name: 'Logistics & Delivery', subCategories: [ 'Freight Shipping', 'Local Delivery', 'Warehousing', 'Inventory Management', 'Courier Services', 'Supply Chain Consulting', 'Last-Mile Delivery' ] }, { id: 'environment', name: 'Environmental Services', subCategories: [ 'Waste Management', 'Recycling Services', 'Environmental Consulting', 'Green Energy Solutions', 'Sustainability Planning', 'Eco-Friendly Product Design', 'Carbon Footprint Analysis' ] }, { id: 'travel', name: 'Travel & Tourism', subCategories: [ 'Travel Planning', 'Tour Guiding', 'Travel Photography', 'Hospitality Services', 'Travel Blogging', 'Adventure Tourism', 'Destination Marketing' ] }, { id: 'fashion', name: 'Fashion & Styling', subCategories: [ 'Fashion Design', 'Personal Styling', 'Tailoring & Alterations', 'Jewelry Design', 'Wardrobe Consulting', 'Fashion Photography', 'Costume Design' ] }, { id: 'home-improvement', name: 'Home Improvement', subCategories: [ 'Interior Design', 'Landscaping', 'Furniture Assembly', 'Home Renovation', 'Handyman Services', 'Smart Home Installation', 'Roofing & Repairs' ] }, { id: 'gaming', name: 'Gaming & Entertainment', subCategories: [ 'Game Development', 'Game Testing', 'Streaming Services', 'Animation & 3D Modeling', 'Esports Coaching', 'Virtual Reality Gaming', 'Game Art & Design' ] }, { id: 'agriculture', name: 'Agriculture & Farming', subCategories: [ 'Organic Farming', 'Agricultural Equipment Repair', 'Crop Management', 'Livestock Care', 'Hydroponics & Aquaponics', 'Farm-to-Market Services', 'Agri-Tech Solutions' ] }, { id: 'non-profit', name: 'Non-Profit & Social Services', subCategories: [ 'Fundraising Consulting', 'Grant Writing', 'Volunteer Coordination', 'Community Outreach', 'Non-Profit Marketing', 'Social Impact Consulting', 'Advocacy & Awareness' ] }, { id: 'pet-services', name: 'Pet Services', subCategories: [ 'Pet Grooming', 'Pet Training', 'Pet Sitting', 'Veterinary Services', 'Pet Photography', 'Pet Product Design', 'Pet Adoption Services' ] }, { id: 'virtual-assistance', name: 'Virtual Assistance', subCategories: [ 'Administrative Support', 'Data Entry', 'Customer Service', 'Calendar Management', 'Email Management', 'Online Research', 'Project Management' ] }, { id: 'security', name: 'Security Services', subCategories: [ 'Cybersecurity Consulting', 'Physical Security', 'Surveillance Systems', 'Risk Assessment', 'Private Investigation', 'Emergency Response Planning', 'Access Control Systems' ] }, { id: 'language', name: 'Language Services', subCategories: [ 'Language Tutoring', 'Interpretation Services', 'Localization Services', 'Transcription Services', 'Subtitling & Captioning', 'Language Learning Apps', 'Cultural Consulting' ] }, { id: 'miscellaneous', name: 'Miscellaneous Services', subCategories: [ 'Errand Running', 'Personal Shopping', 'Mystery Shopping', 'Resume Writing', 'Life Coaching', 'Odd Jobs', 'Relocation Assistance' ] } ]; const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; if (name === 'category') { // Reset subcategory when category changes setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value, subCategory: '' }); } else { setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); } }; const handleFileChange = (e) => { // In a real implementation, this would handle file uploads // For prototype, we'll just store the file names const files = Array.from(e.target.files); setFormData({ ...formData, images: files.map(file => file.name) }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsLoading(true); setError(''); try { // Convert tags from string to array const tagsArray = formData.tags.split(',').map(tag => tag.trim()).filter(tag => tag !== ''); // Prepare gig data const gigData = { ...formData, price: parseFloat(formData.price), deliveryTime: parseInt(formData.deliveryTime), tags: tagsArray }; // In a real implementation, you would handle image uploads here // Create gig const response = await api.post('/gigs', gigData); navigate(`/gigs/${response.data._id}`); } catch (err) { setError(err.response?.data?.message || 'Failed to create gig'); } finally { setIsLoading(false); } }; return (

Create a New Gig

{error && (
{error}
)}

Create a catchy title that clearly describes your service.

Provide a detailed description of what you offer, your experience, and why clients should choose you.

$

Upload up to 5 high-quality images that showcase your service. (For prototype, files won't be uploaded)

); }; export default CreateGig;
